Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-22025 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-22025 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 16.20.2-4, affected by CVE-2024-22025
